item.title: My Mac Setup
item.description: Thanks to my lovely gf, I have been able to get my hands on an Apple M2 lately. Coming from Arch with i3, I thought I’d get to this more UI-based and mouse-involved operating system, which seems like a degradation. However, after some digging, it becomes really comfortable for me being both elegant and efficient. General setup I would skip the system settings part, where you may want to customize display, input methods, or modifier keys etc.
